name: Consumet API
description: A Modern Search Engine API for Anime, Movies, Books, etc.

PORT.description: Set PORT for the fastify application to run on.

REDIS_HOST.description: Set redis host, you can create a redis instance on your own or use upstash (https://upstash.com) its for free.

REDIS_PASS.description: Set redis password, you can create a redis instance on your own or use upstash (https://upstash.com) its for free.

REDIS_PORT.description: Set redis port, you can create a redis instance on your own or use upstash (https://upstash.com) its for free.
